mapper.insert: insert into user_gacha_order (user_id, activity_id, activity_name, strategy_id, order_id, order_time, order_state, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{strategyId}, #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{orderState}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user_gacha_order set order_state='used', update_time=now() where user_id = #{userId} and order_state = 'create'
